contentfulMotionPainting.title: Immortal
contentfulMotionPainting.subtitle: encapturing the sense of peace and tranquility felt while meditating. captured through symbolic depiction of the inventor of yoga in hindu religion.

description.raw:
{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Description","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Immortal
 tries to enrapture the sense of peace and tranquility felt while 
meditating. The main subject is an avatar of Lord Shiva a Hindu primal 
god, which is told to be the inventor of yoga and meditation. His 
Chakras are represented by the colorful orbs in front of him which are 
the colors of the rainbow, they are getting balanced as an act of 
meditation. Two lotus flowers are seen in front with ganja leaves, 
representing the enlightening properties of these two medicine plants, 
used since ancient times to reach heightened states of consciousness. 
The cow and serpent are two mythical animals appearing in most ancient 
mythologies, one representing a source of sustenance, the other wisdom 
attained through hardship. There is a Nazar orb on top of the deity's 
head which is an ancient talisman used in eastern cultures to ward off 
bad energies, the traditional white circle replaced with a triangle to 
represent the three higher Chakras that aspire to the divinity. On the 
right is a space shuttle representing the path of science and on the 
left falling starts representing the path of inner wisdom and mysticism.
 Mount Kailash is shown behind Shiva which is one of his symbols,
 the sky is a gradient made of different lines of colors, which shows 
how the experienced reality is just a veil if you look close enough.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Details","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The
 drawing was made in an improvisational manner, after a transcendent 
experience of mine seeing Shiva in a state of meditation.The 
color palette is inspired by nature and wants to encapture the 
rejuvenation of water mixed with the sturdiness with the skies in the 
mostly blue palette. The piece was created using a Wacom Intuos Draw drawing tablet, 100 percent digitally. It was minted on Opensea.com as the second piece of the Razmard collection. 5 editions were minted and the initial price was listed as 0.033 ETH.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Terms","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"By buying this NFT you agree that:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The artist can use the liking of the artwork in exhibitions, his own social media and online presence and etc.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"You
 can use the liking of the artwork in case of making derivatives, 
private prints (for your own use), and considering fair use in your own 
creative projects.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"You cannot resell the liking of the artwork.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"

Disclaimer:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The piece was initially a 5 editions still image that sold 1 edition on opensea for 0.03 eth but after got removed and reminted on my own contract and air dropped to it's holder as an animated version.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
